data.title: Lt. Col. William Davis, the commander of the 2nd Battalion,
authors: PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine
data.meta_description: Download Image of Lt. Col. William Davis, the commander of the 2nd Battalion,. Free for commercial use, no attribution required.  Lt. Col. William Davis, the commander of the 2nd Battalion, 82nd Field Artillery Regiment, 3rd Armored Brigade Combat Team, 1st Cavalry Division, (right) greets Dr. Hamdullah Mohib, the Afghan ambassador to the U.S., (left) during his visit to Meadows Elementary School at Fort Hood, Texas. The ambassador noted that he wished his childhood in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan has offered the many opportunities the students at Meadows enjoy. (U.S. Army photo by 2nd Lt. Dale K. Willson, 3rd Armored Brigade Combat Team UPAR, 1st Cav. Div. (released). Dated: 15.07.2014. Topics: 1st cavalry division, fort hood, 1st cav div, ambassador, education, afghanistan, killeen independent school district, kisd, 3rd abct, 3rd armored brigade combat team, meadows elementary school, dr hamdullah mohib, lael mohib, meadows elementary welcomes ambassador, dvids, ultra high resolution, high resolution, texas, war in afghanistan 2001 2021
data.text: Lt. Col. William Davis, the commander of the 2nd Battalion, 82nd Field Artillery Regiment, 3rd Armored Brigade Combat Team, 1st Cavalry Division, (right) greets Dr. Hamdullah Mohib, the Afghan ambassador to the U.S., (left) during his visit to Meadows Elementary School at Fort Hood, Texas. The ambassador noted that he wished his childhood in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan has offered the many opportunities the students at Meadows enjoy. (U.S. Army photo by 2nd Lt. Dale K. Willson, 3rd Armored Brigade Combat Team UPAR, 1st Cav. Div. (released)
